name: Visulate
overview:
Visulate is owned and operated by Sue and Peter Goldthorp from Merritt Island, Florida. Sue is a Licensed Real Estate Professional and Peter is a Database Software Architect at Oracle. They developed Visulate in 2007 to help them manage their real estate investments. The site provides property management, investment analysis, double entry bookkeeping and property research facilities.

Visulate maintains records for over 8 million properties in Florida. They provide usage details, size, building features, current owner and sales history for any property in Florida.

Peter is Looking for Business Opportunities and Partners. The technology used to build Visulate is flexible and configurable. Contact Peter if you’d like help solving a real estate related technology problem. These might include expanding the property database to include records from another area, licensing the technology for use on a different site or building a business on the Visulate platform.
